titles.title: Enabling the House of Representatives to be responsive to its membership.
Enabling the House of Representatives to be responsive to its membership.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Rules, and Ethics, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
